title: Bug 2529: Open/Close project not always available
description: Bug 2529: Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When selecting projects P1 and P2, the option to open or close the project is not consistently available.
EB: Either both the options to open and close the project should be available or neither of them should be enabled.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Select projects P1 and P2.
2. Check if the option to open or close the project is available for both projects.
